item.title: [Python] Raspai? What? Level of hardware inexperienced I made a system to understand if there are people in the office
item.description: #Introduction Hello. I am currently working as an intern at an IT company while being a university student in Nagoya. However, when I spend most of my time, I want to work and work on days other than the default workday. After taking a lecture at university, go to work. On such a day, I come to work around 6pm and work until there are no more employees (the office is closed).
